channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1059; 05:00PM; 14858 W Sylvan St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O34jtM; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the fire in 28 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews contained the fire primarily to the eves of the attic, preventing it from extending down into the apartments. No further details.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC14 E102 E239 E289 E290 E39 E88 RA102 RA7 T39 T89 T90; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1059; 04:32PM; 14858 W Sylvan St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O34jtM; Van Nuys; Three story (two residential over parking) garden-style apartment building with an attic fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC14 E102 E239 E289 E290 E39 E88 RA102 RA7 T39 T89 T90; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Update CONCLUDED Hiker Rescue; INC#0413; 09:29AM; 2366 N Astral Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pFiN9H; Hollywood Hills West; Firefighters conducted a two-line rope system and lowered a firefighter to capture the patient (updated to 76yo male) and then raised the patient (and subsequently the firefighter) up to trail level. The uninjured patient declined LAFD treatment and was reunited with his (uninjured) dog. No further details.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC5 E227 E76 E90 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA41 RA827 RH114 T27 UR27 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#0413; 09:13AM; 2366 N Astral Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pFiN9H; Hollywood Hills West; An uninjured, approximately 60yo male hiker is stuck about 30ft down the side of a steep hill, bracing against a tree. His dog is safely up on the trail above. Firefighters are preparing a two-line rope system to lower a rescuer to the patient and then safely capture and bring the patient to level ground. The 9-1-1 call was received at 8:46AM.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC5 E227 E76 E90 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA41 RA827 RH114 T27 UR27 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#0238; 04:51AM; Wb 60 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/43wbejL; Boyle Heights; Single car traffic accident with two patients; one patient (was ejected) transported and one patient sadly determined deceased on scene. Ages/genders unknown. Any media questions are referred to CHP Log#0561; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E10 E202 E25 EM1 HR3 RA17 RA2 RA25 RA809 T2 T9; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#1754; 11:14PM; 6201 N Owensmouth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O0isI1; Woodland Hills; All patients are out of the vehicles and being transported to the hospital with varying levels of injuries. All are categorized as 'critical' due to the high rate of speed of the collision and extensive damage to the vehicles (called mechanism of injury - MOI) One patient is an adult male, gender/age of the other three patients is unknown at this time. All further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 4922; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E106 E293 E305 E72 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA104 RA106 RA107 RA72 RA73 RA96 T105 T93 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#1754; 10:37PM; 6201 N Owensmouth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O0isI1; Woodland Hills; Two car traffic collision with four patients (2 in each vehicle) trapped and in critical condition. Firefighters are conducting extrication operations. Ages/genders unknown at this time.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E106 E293 E305 E72 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA104 RA106 RA107 RA72 RA73 RA96 T105 T93 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Hiker Rescue; INC#1597; 09:34PM; 3000 Reseda Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O1R9NA; Pacific Palisades; Due to the terrain and urgency (hoist operation taking a longer time to execute), LAFD Air Operations is landing on a flat, dirt area next to Reseda Blvd. Firefighters on the ground and LAPD will control traffic for safety. The 55yo male patient will be transported in grave condition. No further details.; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 11; BC17 E109 E293 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA93 RH114 T93; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#1597; 08:41PM; 3000 Reseda Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O1R9NA; Pacific Palisades; Firefighters located and provided advanced life saving care to a 55yo male patient in grave condition due to medical distress (not trauma) and are now moving him by ground to an awaiting helicopter to conduct a hoist operation for air ambulance transport. ; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 11; BC17 E109 E293 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA93 RH114 T93; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1114; 03:51PM; 870 S Norton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3D4U5mi; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: Over 70 firefighters extinguished the Greater Alarm structure fire in 23 minutes with no injuries reported. The preliminary searches found no victims in either structure (home and converted garage). No further details.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC13 BC18 BC4 BC9 CM52 E205 E226 E229 E261 E294 E450 E52 E58 E6 E88 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA29 RA34 RA5 RA61 T26 T29 T5 T61 T94 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13 14 15; Margaret Stewart
